content: St. Matthew's House Skip to content Follow @SMH_Hamilton Toggle Navigation Home About Us Our Team Board Of Directors Annual Reports Services & Programs Children’s Services Senior’s Support Christmas “Adopt-A-Family” Program Mental Health & Street Outreach Help Us Donate Funds Donate Food Volunteer Gallery Contact Us St. Matthew’s House Is A Place Of Hope That Supports People In Need Donate Volunteer Get Help How can we help you? IMPORTANT NOTICE: We regret that due to the present circumstances surrounding the coronavirus outbreak, our centre will be closed until April 5. This includes our Seniors’ Centre at the Eva Rothwell Building on Wentworth Avenue. We apologize for any problems this creates for our clients, but feel it is best for all of us. We will reopen on further notice. Give Help We rise by lifting others! 01 About Us St. Matthew’s House (SMH) began in 1964 as a storefront ministry called The Compass to help residents of Hamilton’s north end. It formed as an outreach program of the Anglican Diocese of Niagara. It has now grown into a charitable, non-profit multi-service agency located on Barton Street between Victoria and Wentworth. 02 Our Programs & Services Our vision is to provide hope and support for people to reach their full potential and lead fulfilling lives Children's Services Our day care program provides excellent, quality day care to over 80 kids a day. We also sponsor kids to attend summer camp. Senior's Support Our seniors program and services offer support to isolated seniors living with income insecurity. Christmas Adopt-A-Family Program We provide new toys/gifts, holiday meals, and household goods each year. $ 0 Donation Target 0 LBs Food Donation 0 /year Clients Served 03 Social Media Feeds How to connect with us? Facebook Twitter https://www.facebook.com/SMHhamilton/ St. Matthew's HouseFollow Retweet on TwitterSt. Matthew's House Retweeted Deirdre Pike@deirdrepike· 12 Apr Christ is Risen! Alleluia! Here’s a taste of the song many of us deem “essential” on this holiest of holy days. I’ll be playing this in my nightly salute to honour healthcare and shelter workers (including janitorial, kitchen and all support staff) over @GoodShepherdHam Square. Note: we're still delivering on Monday! @ErichsCupboard @HamStu_ @HCCI1 4 Reply on TwitterRetweet on Twitter18Like on Twitter61Twitter Retweet on TwitterSt. Matthew's House Retweeted Katherine Kalinowski@KatherineKGSC· 11 Apr Today's to-do list - build pop-up shelter at First Ontario Centre. Starting this weekend and for however long it takes, the big barn at York and Bay welcomes its greatest use yet. Safely sheltering our most vulnerable. Did you decide to have your child stay with one parent? Go between homes? What is working or not working? #HamOnt Contact me at noreilly@thespec.com Reply on TwitterRetweet on Twitter13Like on Twitter8TwitterLoad More... 04 Many thanks to the support from our sponsors, partners, funders and donors who make our work possible! Give Help We rise by lifting others! 01 About Us St. Matthew’s House (SMH) began in 1964 as a storefront ministry called The Compass to help residents of Hamilton’s north end. It formed as an outreach program of the Anglican Diocese of Niagara. It has now grown into a charitable, non-profit multi-service agency located on Barton Street between Victoria and Wentworth. 02 Our Programs & Services Our vision is to provide hope and support for people to reach their full potential and lead fulfilling lives Children's Services Our day care program provides excellent, quality day care to over 80 kids a day. We also sponsor kids to attend summer camp. Senior's Support Our seniors program and services offer support to isolated seniors living with income insecurity. Give Help We rise by lifting others! 01 About Us St. Matthew’s House (SMH) began in 1964 as a storefront ministry called The Compass to help residents of Hamilton’s north end. It formed as an outreach program of the Anglican Diocese of Niagara. It has now grown into a charitable, non-profit multi-service agency located on Barton Street between Victoria and Wentworth. 02 Our Programs & Services Our vision is to provide hope and support for people to reach their full potential and lead fulfilling lives Children's Services Our day care program provides excellent, quality day care to over 80 kids a day. We also sponsor kids to attend summer camp. Senior's Support Our seniors program and services offer support to isolated seniors living with income insecurity. This includes our Seniors’ Centre at the Eva Rothwell Building on Wentworth Avenue. We apologize for any problems this creates for our clients, but feel it is best for all of us. Give Help We rise by lifting others! 01 About Us St. Matthew’s House (SMH) began in 1964 as a storefront ministry called The Compass to help residents of Hamilton’s north end. It formed as an outreach program of the Anglican Diocese of Niagara. It has now grown into a charitable, non-profit multi-service agency located on Barton Street between Victoria and Wentworth. 02 Our Programs & Services Our vision is to provide hope and support for people to reach their full potential and lead fulfilling lives Children's Services Our day care program provides excellent, quality day care to over 80 kids a day. We also sponsor kids to attend summer camp. Senior's Support Our seniors program and services offer support to isolated seniors living with income insecurity. Christmas Adopt-A-Family Program We provide new toys/gifts, holiday meals, and household goods each year. $ 0 Donation Target 0 LBs Food Donation 0 /year Clients Served 03 Social Media Feeds How to connect with us? Give Help We rise by lifting others! 01 About Us St. Matthew’s House (SMH) began in 1964 as a storefront ministry called The Compass to help residents of Hamilton’s north end. It formed as an outreach program of the Anglican Diocese of Niagara. It has now grown into a charitable, non-profit multi-service agency located on Barton Street between Victoria and Wentworth. 02 Our Programs & Services Our vision is to provide hope and support for people to reach their full potential and lead fulfilling lives Children's Services Our day care program provides excellent, quality day care to over 80 kids a day. We also sponsor kids to attend summer camp. Senior's Support Our seniors program and services offer support to isolated seniors living with income insecurity. Christmas Adopt-A-Family Program We provide new toys/gifts, holiday meals, and household goods each year. $ 0 Donation Target 0 LBs Food Donation 0 /year Clients Served 03 Social Media Feeds How to connect with us? Give Help We rise by lifting others! 01 About Us St. Matthew’s House (SMH) began in 1964 as a storefront ministry called The Compass to help residents of Hamilton’s north end. It formed as an outreach program of the Anglican Diocese of Niagara. It has now grown into a charitable, non-profit multi-service agency located on Barton Street between Victoria and Wentworth. 02 Our Programs & Services Our vision is to provide hope and support for people to reach their full potential and lead fulfilling lives Children's Services Our day care program provides excellent, quality day care to over 80 kids a day. We also sponsor kids to attend summer camp. Senior's Support Our seniors program and services offer support to isolated seniors living with income insecurity. Give Help We rise by lifting others! 01 About Us St. Matthew’s House (SMH) began in 1964 as a storefront ministry called The Compass to help residents of Hamilton’s north end. It formed as an outreach program of the Anglican Diocese of Niagara. It has now grown into a charitable, non-profit multi-service agency located on Barton Street between Victoria and Wentworth. 02 Our Programs & Services Our vision is to provide hope and support for people to reach their full potential and lead fulfilling lives Children's Services Our day care program provides excellent, quality day care to over 80 kids a day. We also sponsor kids to attend summer camp. Senior's Support Our seniors program and services offer support to isolated seniors living with income insecurity. Christmas Adopt-A-Family Program We provide new toys/gifts, holiday meals, and household goods each year. $ 0 Donation Target 0 LBs Food Donation 0 /year Clients Served 03 Social Media Feeds How to connect with us? Give Help We rise by lifting others! 01 About Us St. Matthew’s House (SMH) began in 1964 as a storefront ministry called The Compass to help residents of Hamilton’s north end. It formed as an outreach program of the Anglican Diocese of Niagara. It has now grown into a charitable, non-profit multi-service agency located on Barton Street between Victoria and Wentworth. 02 Our Programs & Services Our vision is to provide hope and support for people to reach their full potential and lead fulfilling lives Children's Services Our day care program provides excellent, quality day care to over 80 kids a day. We also sponsor kids to attend summer camp. Senior's Support Our seniors program and services offer support to isolated seniors living with income insecurity. Christmas Adopt-A-Family Program We provide new toys/gifts, holiday meals, and household goods each year. $ 0 Donation Target 0 LBs Food Donation 0 /year Clients Served 03 Social Media Feeds How to connect with us? St. Matthew's House | St. Matthew's House is a place of hope that supports people in need in the City of Hamilton. About Us Our Team Board of Directors Annual Reports Services & Programs Childcare Services Seniors Support Adopt a Family/Senior Holiday Program Mental Health & Street Outreach Support Donate Funds Donate Food Volunteer News Contact Us Donate Select Page St. Matthew’s House is a place of hope that supports people in need. How can we help you? Get Help We rise by lifting others! Give Help About St. Matthew’s House St. Matthew’s House (SMH) began in 1964 as a storefront ministry called The Compass to help residents of Hamilton’s north end. It formed as an outreach program of the Anglican Diocese of Niagara. It has now grown into a charitable, non-profit multi-service agency located on Barton Street between Victoria and Wentworth. LEARN MORE Our Programs & Services Our vision is to provide hope and support for people to reach their full potential and lead fulfilling lives. Childcare Services Our day care program provides excellent, quality day care to over 80 kids a day. We also sponsor kids to attend summer camp! Learn More Senior's Support Our seniors program and services offer support to isolated seniors living with income insecurity. Learn More "Adopt-A-Family" Program Every Christmas, we provide new toys/gifts, holiday meals, and household goods to families in need. Learn More Donation Target ($) Lbs of Food Donated Clients Served/Year Many thanks for the support from our funders and supporters who make our work possible! Help us help our community! We rise by lifting others. How can we help you? Get Help We rise by lifting others! Give Help About St. Matthew’s House St. Matthew’s House (SMH) began in 1964 as a storefront ministry called The Compass to help residents of Hamilton’s north end. It formed as an outreach program of the Anglican Diocese of Niagara. It has now grown into a charitable, non-profit multi-service agency located on Barton Street between Victoria and Wentworth. LEARN MORE Our Programs & Services Our vision is to provide hope and support for people to reach their full potential and lead fulfilling lives. Give Help About St. Matthew’s House St. Matthew’s House (SMH) began in 1964 as a storefront ministry called The Compass to help residents of Hamilton’s north end. It formed as an outreach program of the Anglican Diocese of Niagara. It has now grown into a charitable, non-profit multi-service agency located on Barton Street between Victoria and Wentworth. LEARN MORE Our Programs & Services Our vision is to provide hope and support for people to reach their full potential and lead fulfilling lives. Give Help About St. Matthew’s House St. Matthew’s House (SMH) began in 1964 as a storefront ministry called The Compass to help residents of Hamilton’s north end. It formed as an outreach program of the Anglican Diocese of Niagara. It has now grown into a charitable, non-profit multi-service agency located on Barton Street between Victoria and Wentworth. LEARN MORE Our Programs & Services Our vision is to provide hope and support for people to reach their full potential and lead fulfilling lives. Childcare Services Our day care program provides excellent, quality day care to over 80 kids a day. We also sponsor kids to attend summer camp! Learn More Senior's Support Our seniors program and services offer support to isolated seniors living with income insecurity.
